content:
<md>Office Hour Times
===============

On the 6.100A/B website, it says that office hour times are marked down on the main course site. Is this not the main course website? I checked canvas, and did not find any office hour time listings there either. Where can I find this information?</md>
subject: Office Hour Times

content:
<md>https://sicp-s1.mit.edu/fall22 should have the Office Hours information on the main page under "Office Hours." 

This is the information on the site, which is the main course site.

In-person in 38-370 and on Zoom (get a spot via the [Help Queue](https://sicp-s1.mit.edu/fall22/queue))  
**No OH during lecture hours**  
OH start Thursday the first week of classes  
Monday-Thursday: 9am-9pm  
Friday 9am-5pm</md>
